name: Holy Sheet! Mask Set
about: What it is:A generous limited-edition sheet mask set that contains 20 masks to pamper yourself from head to toe this holiday season..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Dullness and Dark Circles.Formulation:Mask.What Else You Need to Know:The iconic SEPHORA COLLECTION Holy Sheet! Mask Set is back. Inside, youu2019ll find 20 individual masks formulated with over 91 percent ingredients of natural origin.* Presented in a large gift set, this generous collection is sure to make someone happy, with masks for the face, eyes, nose, lips, hair, hands, and feet. This set was developed using a more responsible approach: the cardboard packaging was produced from sustainably managed forests..This Set Contains:- Matcha Face Mask

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Charcoal Nose Strip:.-Use twice a week. .-Remove makeup and clean nose. .-Do not dry completely, leave skin damp. .-Remove the transparent, protective film. .-Apply the strip onto your slightly damp nose skin with the shiny side against the skin. .-Leave it on for ten minutes. .-Peel the strip off. ..Eye Masks: .-Remove one protective film. .-Place the patch under the eye. .-Remove the two other films and place the second patch. .-Leave on for five minutes, then remove and massage any excess product into the skin. .-No need to rinse. ..Face Masks: .-Unfold the sheet mask. .-Apply mask to clean, dry skin. .-Leave the sheet mask on the face for ten minutes before removing. .-No need to rinse. .-Avoid contact with eyes. .-Use twice weekly. .-Tip: Massage in any remaining serum using the Sephora Collection Rose Quartz Facial Roller (sold separately). .-The pouch is made with 16 percent recycled plastic and can be recycled. .-The sheet mask is compostable. ..Hand Masks: .-Use twice a week. .-Put gloves on clean, dry hands. .-Peel the paper-film off the tab and fold around the wrist to close well. .-Leave on for 15 minutes. .-Gently massage any excess product into the skin. .-No need to rinse. ..Foot Masks: .-Use twice a week. .-Peel the paper film off the tab..-Fold around the ankle and press well to close. .-Leave them on for 20 minutes. .-Gently massage any excess product into skin. .-No need to rinse. .-Precaution: Be careful not to slip, avoid walking with the masks on, and massage in excess product after use. ..Hair Masks: .-Use twice a week. .-Before bed, apply the cream hair mask all over dry hair, focusing on ends. .-Place cap over hair and let it work overnight. .-In the morning, rinse well and wash if necessary. ..Cherry Lip Mask: .-Peel off the first moisturizing mask protective film. .-Apply the moisturizing mask to your lips and press so it sticks to the skin. .-Peel off the second protective film..-Leave on lips for five minutes, then remove and gently massage in any remaining product. .-No need to rinse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I n my kid love these masks.. relaxing n pampering selves at-home.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this set to gift to my aunts and grandma and mom and they loved it my friend recommended the Sephora brand of face masks and I tried it and so I just had to get this set
